title: David Bowie - 1999-10-14 The Small Club, Paris, France (SBD-FLAC
description:
David Bowie - 1999-10-14 The Small Club, Paris, France (SBD-FLAC)

Date: October 14, 1999
Venue: The Small Club
Location: Paris, France

Unofficial Soundboard Recording


Track List:
1. Life On Mars?
2. Thursday's Child 
3. Something In The Air 
4. Word On A Wing 
5. Can't Help Thinking About Me 
6. China Girl 
7. Always Crashing In The Same Car
8. Survive
9. Drive-In Saturday
10. Changes
11. Seven
12. I Can't Read
13. The Pretty Things Are Going To Hell
14. Rebel Rebel

Run time 72:31

This is a very high quality 72 minute soundboard recording, taken from a gig at the Elysee Montmartre, Paris on October 14th 1999.  At the beginning, David tries his hand at dropping a few one-liners in French, to the crowds delight.  The rest of the set is solid, and is typical of his live sets during the 'Hours...' tour, except for Something In The Air, which is the first time it's ever been done live.  Also, the segment where Bowie asks Gail Ann Dorsey three questions for a chance to win a 'dirty weekend in Paris' was good fun...

Trade CD-R --> EAC --> FLAC
